医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
比利时即用肉类替代品的营养价值研究人员将即用肉类替代品与真正的肉类产品的营养成分进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/The-nutritional-value-of-ready-to-use-meat-alternatives-in-Belgium.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/The-nutritional-value-of-ready-to-use-meat-alternatives-in-Belgium.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ef76d44-21c4-419f-aa86-23a959a3ed77 Fri, 31 May 2024 04:13:00 -0400 The nutritional value of ready-to-use meat alternatives in Belgium
RNA 干扰剂 plozasiran 靶向 APOC3 有效治疗混合性高脂血症研究人员评估了 plazosiran 治疗对混合性高脂血症成年患者空腹甘油三酯水平的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-interference-agent-plozasiran-targets-APOC3-for- effective-mixed-hyperlipidemia-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-interference-agent-plozasiran-targets-APOC3-for- effective-mixed-hyperlipidemia-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7828e0ab-65a2-4b25-abc1-a64c4cb126a8 Fri, 31 May 2024 04:06:00 -0400 RNA interference agent plozasiran targets APOC3 for effective mixed hyperlipidemia treatment
研究人员发现了儿童脊索瘤的两类遗传原因人们对脊索瘤（一种罕见且具有侵袭性的骨肿瘤）的遗传学和生物学知之甚少。在美国，每年约有百万分之一的人患有脊索瘤，其中只有百分之五是儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Researchers-uncover-two-classes-of-genic-causes-for-pediatric-chordoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Researchers-uncover-two-classes-of-genic-causes-for-pediatric-chordoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e3a21a4-caef-41f7-ab4c-91ebab7141ea Thu, 30 May 2024 23:24:24 -0400 Researchers uncover two classes of genetic causes for pediatric chordoma
研究可能有助于开发新的精神分裂症个性化治疗方法 一项国际研究出版物...一项由德尔马医院医学研究所牵头，与巴斯克地区大学神经精神药理学小组 (UPV/EHU) 的研究人员和 CIBER 心理健康 (CIBERSAM) 的研究人员合作进行的一项国际研究，发表在《自然通讯》上，可能有助于为诊断为精神分裂症的人创造新的个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-may-facilitate-the-development-of-new-personalized-treatments-for-schizophrenia-An-International-Study-Publi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-may-facilitate-the-development-of-new-personalized-treatments-for-schizophrenia-An-International-Study-Publi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b952198e-0628-4013-8b39-81716e7e7d99 Thu, 30 May 2024 22:54:13 -0400 Study may facilitate the development of new personalized treatments for schizophrenia An International Study Publi...
维克森林大学的研究人员获得 150 万美元的 NIH 拨款来研究减肥手术后的骨骼健康维克森林大学医学院的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家关节炎、肌肉骨骼和皮肤疾病研究所获得了为期五年、价值 150 万美元的资助，用于研究减肥手术后患者的骨微结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Wake-Forest-researchers-to-study-bone-health-post-bariatric-surgery-with-2415-million-NIH-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Wake-Forest-researchers-to-study-bone-health-post-bariatric-surgery-with-2415-million-NIH-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a716d2c-d50c-4300-b3a9-d4ad2ca4618d Thu, 30 May 2024 22:48:05 -0400 Wake Forest researchers to study bone health post-bariatric surgery with $1.5 million NIH grant
研究检验了肺癌靶向免疫疗法的成本效益许多拥有国家医疗保健系统或保险公司等付款人的国家使用成本效益分析来决定是否承保新药，平衡治疗成本与潜在的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-examines-the-cost-effectness-of-a-targeted-immunotherapy-for-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-examines-the-cost-effectness-of-a-targeted-immunotherapy-for-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=effddb6b-ba20-48db-8080-ca84524d570c Thu, 30 May 2024 22:43:22 -0400 Study examines the cost-effectiveness of a targeted immunotherapy for lung cancer
圣母大学研究确定了因纤溶缺陷而导致 CAUTI 的高危人群几乎所有外科手术都需要导尿管。然而，医疗保健行业面临的一个主要挑战是预测谁可能会患上导管相关尿路感染 (CAUTI) 以及这些感染何时可能导致死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Notre-Dame-study-identizes-high-risk-population-for-CAUTIS-due-to-fibrinolytic-deficicies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Notre-Dame-study-identizes-high-risk-population-for-CAUTIS-due-to-fibrinolytic-deficicies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=393f8f90-a39d-4cae-bb3d-c2cc9dee78f4 Thu, 30 May 2024 22:35:09 -0400 Notre Dame study identifies high-risk population for CAUTIs due to fibrinolytic deficiencies
梅奥诊所的研究人员发现了与妇科癌症相关的微生物特征早期检测可以改善子宫内膜癌和卵巢癌的治疗效果，但女性往往在这些疾病的晚期才被诊断出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-uncover-microbial-signatures-linked-to-gynecologic-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-uncover-microbial-signatures-linked-to-gynecologic-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b7b3e3a-2ff6-49d9-911e-ac79ec44d025 Thu, 30 May 2024 15:55:00 -0400 Mayo Clinic researchers uncover microbial signatures linked to gynecologic cancers
尽管人们高度认识到早期检测的好处，但沙特阿拉伯在结直肠癌筛查方面仍然落后根据沙特卫生委员会发布的2020年沙特国家癌症登记统计数据，结直肠癌（CRC）在癌症种类中排名第二，男性第一，女性第三，占12.3%，在所有登记的癌症中，结直肠癌（CRC）有1729例。癌症病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Saudi-Arabia-lags-in-CRC-screening-尽管-high-awareness-of-early-detection-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Saudi-Arabia-lags-in-CRC-screening-尽管-high-awareness-of-early-detection-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1faecea0-fd4f-48ef-8191-4a7b219df2df Thu, 30 May 2024 15:48:00 -0400 Saudi Arabia lags in CRC screening despite high awareness of early detection benefits
肥大细胞和 PGE2：控制哮喘炎症的关键因素先前的研究表明，肥大细胞是一种存在于全身组织中的免疫细胞，在哮喘发作期间会引起炎症，引发呼吸困难和气道狭窄等症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Mast-cells-and-PGE2-Key-players-in-controlling-asthma-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Mast-cells-and-PGE2-Key-players-in-controlling-asthma-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0492e886-b361-4fb9-ac4a-086ad7b91e52 Thu, 30 May 2024 15:40:00 -0400 Mast cells and PGE2: Key players in controlling asthma inflammation
